thought.text: Now let me try to run the existing tests to see if I can reproduce the issue without building the full package. Let me try to run just the diff tests:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpvq5i4eh4/astropy && python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '.')
try:
    from astropy.io.fits.diff import TableDataDiff
    from astropy.io.fits.column import Column
    from astropy.io.fits.hdu.table import BinTableHDU
    print('Successfully imported astropy modules')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Import failed: {e}')
"
